com.caozj.framework.util.zookeeper

类 ZookeeperUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.caozj.framework.util.zookeeper.ZookeeperUtil

  • public class ZookeeperUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    zookeeper工具类(临时节点只能建立在永久节点上)(监听都是一次性的)
    作者:
    caozj
